extendedInfo.description: Trillian for Android helps you chat with your IM and Facebook friends while on-the-go.  Receive C2DM push notifications, send pictures and messages, and optionally synchronize with Trillian for Mac, Windows, and Web.  You can even use Trillian to Trillian messaging to save on SMS costs!

reviews.title: Old UI and not practical or logical to use
reviews.comment: The app was good, but it\'s hardly bring developed anymore. It has fallen behind other apps. Like the desktop version, this app is slowly dying. Support is also lacking and global chat intrigration is not creative either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be great
reviews.comment: I use AIM and trillian does a great job on the desktop and this app.  As of late, trillian just dies silently.  It used to stay up and connected much better before.
reviews.author: David Narine

reviews.title: Solid app but a ripoff to buy
reviews.comment: It\'s a good enough app but they charge a recurring fee just to hide the ads and log past entries. The theme is dark so the ads are glaring.. as if on purpose. Enjoy but don\'t waste your money.
reviews.author: Erik Mattern

reviews.title: One big problem:
reviews.comment: It is constantly putting me in away mode. Having the app always running and connected is pointless if I always appear away. Needs an option to disable this \"feature\".
reviews.author: Tim Cox

reviews.title: Has become worthless
reviews.comment: Facebook never logs in anymore. I have better luck with apps for each service I use, rather than with this. Says I\'m always offline & messages never send.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slows down phone.
reviews.comment: As soon as I stopped Trillian from running constantly, my phone felt like new again. What\'s the point of an IM program if you can\'t keep it running? Go ahead, I\'ll wait.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer works
reviews.comment: Latest update causes nothing to come through unless you bring app to focus which defeats the whole purpose.  HTC rezound
reviews.author: Peter Stone

reviews.title: Used to be great.
reviews.comment: After the update on the 3rd, my Samsung Vibrant has been unable to get past the sign in screen. It just hangs there attempting to sign in. If I leave it lo g enough, it goes to the area where contacts normally show, but shows offline. If I touch the status, and try to change to online and hit save, it force closes. I hoped the second update today would ha e resolved this but it hasn\'t.
reviews.author: Xaero Degreaz

reviews.title: Needs attention
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using Trillian for so many years I can\'t remember what it is like to have 4 different IM chat programs running... the android version is hurting... desktop version works still but in today\'s world you\'ve got to be focusing on mobile devices. I regret having to rate this under 5 stars... but accounts won\'t stay logged in, it says they are logged in but aren\'t, and the lack of updates makes me wonder about the future of this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Closes constantly
reviews.comment: open and logged on for the max amount of time, Trillian now refuses to stay open for me, closing numerous times a day. I\'ve checked all my phone settings, nothing should be causing this. Uninstalling in favor of a new app, and won\'t resubscribe to Trillian if this isn\'t fixed. Main reason I subscribe is for cloud sync with my desktop which is no help when products fail.
reviews.author: Elaine Tennyson

reviews.title: Can\'t Stay Sync\'d With Google Talk
reviews.comment: Misses incoming messages and fails to grab messages posted through other clients.  Save the money - it\'s crap. Will be looking for a full refund.
reviews.author: Joseph Moon

reviews.title: Dead Application
reviews.comment: Seriously disappointed with this application. Even with a lifetime license, I\'ve found this to be the poorest if all multi IM applications. Looks horrible, crashes, freezes, lacks the new features most other applications provide.
reviews.author: Chris Basson

reviews.title: Unable to connect with Yahoo!
reviews.comment: Tried about everything, just not working. I guess I\'ll use the default Yahoo! client.
reviews.author: Stefan Constantin Ciobanasu

reviews.title: Sign out barely works
reviews.comment: 5-6 times I have to back out of app, re-open, go to menu, more and try and tap sign out...and most of the time I get no response.  Seriously irritating, and no way to report the issue in the app either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nope
reviews.comment: I used to use the desktop version a long time ago and now it wants you to make a trillian account, i have too many IM accounts already which is why i wanted trillian on my phone...
reviews.author: Robert Deford

reviews.title: Needs upgrade ...
reviews.comment: I have been using Trillian for years, first on Windows, then on iPhone, on Mac and now on Android. Though I love Trillian on every thing I used, I can\'t shake the feeling that the android version needs some rework, especially the UI. The current UI haven\'t change since the Honeycomb age, at least not anything visually obvious. We are moving on while Trillian stays behind, the unchangeable black background, the ugly tab buttons and the fact that you can\'t hide the icon of your contacts seems to come from a time of old.  We need a new look, a holo/minimalistic theme

reviews.title: Samsung GT I9070
reviews.comment: This software is supporting me, but I didn\'t add my Skype Account in this, Please any one advice me and help me out this.   But I can add my Skype Account in Desktop Version why it is not possible in my Samsung GT I9070 - Android 2.3.6 - GingerBird OS.  (SMART PHONE)  Thanks, Dhanesh.
reviews.author: Dhanesh Preethi

reviews.title: Can\'t save pictures anymore..
reviews.comment: I used to be able to long tap and save the pictures people IM me, now I have to screenshot them, thereby not getting the whole pic or getting black borders. This is a simple feature, and its on the iPhone and desktop versions..
reviews.author: Spyros Bogdanos

reviews.title: Used the desktop for years.
reviews.comment: I have used the desktop client for many years and the android version for 2 years. Since the last update it is nearly unusable due to the fact that it won\'t stay open in the background for more than a couple of minutes. No amount of playing with the settings seems to do much. I may have to abandon both clients now as there is no point in using my Astra account if I can\'t talk with those contacts on the go. Fix this or you\'ll lose roughly 7 customers when I switch as they will likely follow me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but..
reviews.comment: Why doesn\'t the app have access to skype? And for security and safety reasons it would be better if we had to sign in to trillian first to acess our accounts.
reviews.author: Kevin Li
